issue.title: [CF 552] _cast_success
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create Combat Event icon
2. Choose any spell
3. Check for Cast -> Spell Cast Success

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
The icon should show when a spell is successfully cast.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
r559

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
My combat log only shows the _CAST_START event, even with all option checked.


> Posted by CurseForge user heltonaugusto | Imported from CurseForge issue #552 | Raw

comments.body:
It seems that Blizzard has decided that SPELL_CAST_SUCCESS should no longer fire for spells with cast times. It only fires for instant casts now.

Unfortunately, there is nothing that I can do to fix this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Updated the name and description of this event. That is the only thing that I can do for it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I used to have a icon to show for how long targets would be affected by Flamestrike and Blastwave, now the Flamestrike spell have a cast time again and the icon stopped working.

For what I saw in the thread in wowinterface that you created you can still track the the cast success if you know what unit to look at. Can you add this functionality on the Spell Cast filter? I can make a icon to show when I'm casting a spell, I want to show the Icon just when I finished it.

Is what I want already possible?

EDIT:

I did what I wanted creating a conditional icon to check when the spell entered in CD and setting a timer on it. It works just fine for flamestrike/Ring of frost.

Edited Aug 30, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user heltonaugusto

The problem with UNIT_SPELLCAST_SUCCEEDED is that it doesn't mesh well at all with CLEU. CLEU is a completely unitless event, and one of its main purposes is to be able to track events from anybody - not just people in the vicinity.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I meant to add a spell cast track not in the "combat event" filter, but in the "spell cast" one, for when you know which unit to track (player, target...). As I can see you can only show the icon when something is being cast, not when it finish.


> Posted by CurseForge user heltonaugusto
